house_listing.house_description: One of a kind. Over 500' of gorgeous Cypress Creek w/deep pools of crystal clear water. Situated at the end of the road on a secluded, yet close in 2+ acres offering a quaint 1930's rock house w/no visible neighbors. Massive Cypress & Pecan trees cover this private retreat. Home offers unique rock fireplace w/raised hearth & 8' cedar mantle, open wood ceilings, upgraded kitchen, screened porch, wood deck, footed tub, rock shower, interior wood shutters, wooden Dutch door, interior rock & wood walls & public water supply. Must see!
